title: Bloomberg Markets: Senator Baucus on Need for Tax Reform
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Senator Baucus on Need for Tax Reform
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Max Baucus\u0010Former U.S. Senator and Former Ambassador to China\u0010Discussing U.S. tax reform and the need to "broaden the base and lower the rates."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
